sentences.en: Clemenza and Tessio considered this suicidal, especially with the Barzini - Tattaglia encroachments on their empires.
sentences.cn: 克莱门扎和忒希奥两个人认为这种局面就是自杀.尤其是巴茨尼. 塔塔格里亚联盟对他们的疆域虎视眈眈,得寸进尺.

sentences.en: Counsellors are used to dealing with suicidal people.
sentences.cn: 心理问题咨询人员惯于同有自杀倾向的人打交道.

sentences.en: Folly, folly , his heart kept saying: conscious , gratuitous, suicidal folly.
sentences.cn: 他心里不住地说着: 真蠢, 真蠢,蠢得自觉自愿, 蠢得无缘无故, 蠢得自己找死!

sentences.en: For many years before treatment, Clare had suicidal tendencies (= behaviour that showed she wanted to kill herself ) .
sentences.cn: 在治疗前的许多年里，克莱尔都有自杀倾向。

sentences.en: He became very depressed and even got suicidal at one point.
sentences.cn: 他变得十分消沉,甚至一度想自杀.

sentences.en: He grew suicidal, thinking up ways to end it all.
sentences.cn: 他萌生了自杀的念头，想出各种自我了断的办法。
他看上去很沮丧, 甚至于沮丧到想自杀.

sentences.en: Helen had been struggling against suicidal tendencies.
sentences.cn: 海伦一直在压制心里的自杀念头。

sentences.en: Her suicidal tendencies continued for several more weeks.
sentences.cn: 她的自杀倾向又持续了几周。

sentences.en: I was suicidal and just couldn'tstop crying.
sentences.cn: 我当时想自杀，一直哭个不停。

sentences.en: In dealing with suicidal youngsters, our aims should be clear.
sentences.cn: 在对待有自杀倾向的青少年时，我们的目标应当很明确。

sentences.en: On bad days I even felt suicidal.
sentences.cn: 赶上不顺的日子，我都觉得不想活了。

sentences.en: One can't reckon on suicidal madness in the enemy.
sentences.cn: 谁也估计不到敌人会有近于自杀的疯狂行为.

sentences.en: She was depressed and almost suicidal.
There is medical evidence to show that he is suicidal and clinically depressed.
sentences.cn: 医学证据表明他有自杀倾向而且临床诊断为抑郁.

sentences.en: They realized it would be suicidal to resist in the face of overwhelming military superiority.
sentences.cn: 他们意识到面对力量相差如此悬殊的军队，抵抗无异于自取灭亡。

sentences.en: This clown's impotent, suicidal and incredibly stupid.
sentences.cn: 这个小丑性无能有自杀倾向,愚蠢!

words.tran_cn: 自杀的，自杀性的；自我毁灭的；自取灭亡的

trans.tran_cn: （想）自杀的，自杀性的，自我毁灭的，自取灭亡的，于己不利
